Akron.WRLM (TV): WRLM, virtual channel 47 (UHF digital channel 50), is a TCT owned-and-operated television station serving Cleveland and Akron, Ohio, United States that is licensed to Canton. The station is owned by Tri-State Christian Television. WRLM maintains offices located on Front Street in Cuyahoga Falls, and its transmitter is located in Brimfield (near Interstate 76).
